profile:
Aqua Tech Waterproofing  is the most experienced and affordable privately owned company that offers basement  waterproofing,underpinning, basement lowering,concrete floors and drain services to families and businesses across the Greater Toronto Area. Based out of Toronto and operating over 20  trucks across GTA, we are conveniently located to service you in Oakville, Richmond Hill, Metro Toronto or Ajax. 

With more than 25 years of experience our trained technicians offer a quality, reliable and stress free waterproofing service. You can count on it. In addition, our friendly and professional staff is here to answer any questions you may have about our company or our services. 

Have an emergency? Donâ€™t hesitate. Our 24 hour Emergency phone line is here to serve you better.

Clogged drains? Leaking taps? Clogged toilet? Repairs? and more? We have what you need at highly competitive prices you can afford. We will either match or even beat other estimates. At Aqua Tech Waterproofing and Drain, our goal is about doing the job right the first time around.

We use the most sophisticated technology combined with high knowledge of our services, which means the problem is fixed fast by a systems qualified plumber, leaving you worry free.

We look forward to hearing from you.

profile:
Thank you for taking the time to visit our Homestars page!

We appreciate any opportunity to provide a free quote for your wet basement waterproofing and foundation crack repair. Dryshield is a Family owned and operated basement waterproofing company Toronto and most of southern Ontario. We pride ourselves on our basement waterproofing and foundation crack repair workmanship. Our mission is to continue providing you with the highest quality products, technologies and procedures at the most competitive price for your wet basement waterproofing needs.  We offer a wide range of solutions for your leaky or wet basement. Some of the solutions are; internal drainage systems, external waterproofing, window wells, basement crack repair and sump pumps.  

All of our work provided is Dryshield employed and not by subcontractors.  Our team at Dryshield works hard day in and day out to provide you with the highest quality of workmanship. 

We are fully licensed and insured. All prices are up front with no hidden surprises. Dryshield can beat any quality competitor with a difference in cost and quality.

Things to look for that can be contributing to your wet basement:

-	Are your down spouts discharging at the side of your house or are they connected to the ground?
-	Is the grade sloping towards your house causing a wet basement? 
-	Do you see any signs of a foundation concrete crack? 
-	How old is your home is and what condition are your weeping tiles are in?


If you have a wet basement and need a waterproofing company for your basement waterproofing needs contact Dryshield today!

www.waterproofingservice.com or 1-800-277-5411

Servicing Toronto & the GTA (radius of 80 km) , we specialize in all major UNDERGROUND and minor plumbing and drain projects, basement waterproofing. profile:
Welcome to Canada Waterproofers, your one stop shop for all your waterproofing, plumbing and drain repair needs. Canada Waterproofers provide top-quality material and service. With over 25 years experience we know what products, methods and application works best for your unique situation.

Canada Waterproofers specialize in helping you with all your Waterproofing Drain and Plumbing needs. For 25 years servicing the local community with pride.

We believe that high quality workmanship and materials are key to get he job done right the first time. Canada Waterproofers treat our customers homes as if it was our own. From complete home waterproofing to minor repairsâ€¦we do it right!

Canada Waterproofers believes in old school values, this is very important in a business filled with dishonesty and careless workmanship.

Here at Canada Waterproofers we are proud of our work, and love to share every step of the job with our customers. Doing this they can understand and be involved on how the job being performed and applies to their unique situation. 

Canada Waterproofers can help you with any project big or small, and are always just a phone call away to answer any questions or concerns. 

We believe in personalization so when you call our company we wonâ€™t send you a sales person. We believe that this is unfair to our customers as we are not interested in just selling a job, but rather figuring out what the problem is at your home and offering the best solution.

Benefits to our customers


25 Year Transferable warranty provided
Over 25-years experience in the industry.
We are fully licensed, insured and have full WSIB coverage
Highly trained technicians that are licensed plumbers and waterproofers.
Building renovators licenses.
Underpinning experts.
We will detect any water leakage on your property, and fix it the first time!
Free non- obligation estimate is provided to all costumers. 
We use the latest technology available to make sure our services are top quality.
We only repair what is required, at very competitive prices. Saving homeowners thousands of dollars.

Integrity, Honesty and the highest quality workmanship within the industry. Canada Waterproofers is here for you. 

Canada Waterproofers will provide a free no obligation written quote before any work is performed. Once you decide to go ahead with the work rest assured one of our technicians will be constantly monitoring the onsite site activity to be sure that the work is performed to our high standards. 

Our technicians pride themselves attending to the smallest of details. Nothing is left to chance therefore ensuring your project is completed to the highest standards.

Here are just some services that we provide

Exterior waterproofing
Interior waterproofing
Sump pump installations
Sump pump battery back up systems
Backflow preventers 
Snaking
Camera inspections
Plumbing
And more...

The Team at Canada Waterproofers will only be content when our customers are happy. Itâ€™s important our company constantly keeps up our high quality in workmanship and materials to be sure that our customers are completely satisfied now and in the future.

The climate is changing and the challenge of keeping our aging homes becomes more of an issue. Canada Waterproofers are up for the task. Your basement will stay dry and your plumbing will perform properly for years to come. Choose Canada Waterproofers.
www.canadawaterproofers.com/basementwaterproofing

profile:
DrainWorks Plumbing is a customer-first, Toronto-based plumbing company providing full plumbing services, drain cleaning, drain repair and drain replacement. All our plumbers are 100% licensed, insured and commission-free! We take great pride in being one of the most reviewed companies on HomeStars in North America! We are also proud to say that we have been chosen (twice) as the "best plumber in the city" by Toronto Life magazine, as evidenced by their "Busy person's survival guide" issue. High praise from a wonderful and trusted publication! 

We employ full-time salaried plumbers rather than commission-based plumbers that are motivated to up-sell you. All of the DrainWorks plumbers in Toronto and surrounding areas are fully licensed, insured, and professionally trained. We are also proud to say that 100% of our employees have been with us for 10 years or more. Finally, an experienced local plumber near you that you can trust and rely on!
 
Further, we've recently had the honor of being one of a select few companies across all trades, hand picked by Gemini award winning TV host and contractor, Bryan Baeumler, of HGTV's Leave it to Bryan and Disaster DIY to be Baeumler Approved. A high mark of quality, indeed. 
 
You can count on DrainWorks for all your plumbing and drain-related needs in Toronto. Our plumbers are ready for your call with clear and upfront pricing and will always arrive on-time and fully prepared with everything they can foreseeably need.

DrainWorks Plumbing also likes to help and support our local Toronto community and charities, such as for the Easter Seals and SickKids Foundation.
Please take a few moments to read these plumbing reviews from our customers, so you too can learn about and take advantage of the â€˜DrainWorks Differenceâ€™. We hope you choose us for your next call to the plumber!

**COVID-19 UPDATE - DrainWorks Plumbing is open and in full operation adhering to all Covid-19 protocols in place to offer the help you need when you need it most keeping everyone safe.**

The ROOTERWORX was established by a team that is experienced, skilled, and are in construction for decades. 

The head office of the ROOTERWORX is located in Mississauga and covers Toronto and GTA.
There are two divisions in our company for residential services: drain repair, catch basin cleaning, waterproofing, foundation & structural repair, concrete repair, concrete & foundation crack repair. 

And commercial services and multi-residential (apartment buildings, condominiums, commercial facilities): kitchen drain stack cleaning, negative side waterproofing, elevator shaft waterproofing, expansion joint waterproofing, ledge beam repair, concrete balcony repair, underground garage structural repair, underground garage waterproofing, underground garage concrete repair.

We know how to make quality; we learned the most efficient practices and use the best products on the market approved by building official associates. 
We have learned a lot through those years, and now we deliver the best to our customers.

Also, ROOTERWORX is open 24/7 for drain cleaning and drain repair services! 

416-400-2685

profile: Aquamaster Group has two divisions to serve you better: Concrete Division that specializes on all types of concrete work like : foundations, underpinnings, additions, concrete walkways, driveways, pads e.c. and Plumbing Division, providing plumbing and drain services, drain cleaning and repair and all associated works as well as waterproofing.  Having two locations, one in Toronto another one in Mississauga gives us possibility to cover sufficient service area and provide you with same day service. We are fully licensed and insured. We guarantee fast and cost efficient solutions and excellent quality services. Knowledge and experience of our workers extends to every area of plumbing, drain, underpinning and waterproofing. We offer emergency plumbing services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. At Aquamaster we guarantee excellent quality services, individual approach and the most affordable prices in Toronto and GTA. The plumbers at Water Guard Plumbing pride themselves on their professionalism and ability to complete a job in a timely manner, to an industry standard. Since itâ€™s establishment in 2006, Water Guard Plumbing has worked with a number of contractors and home owners on a variety of different projects. Backwater valve and sump pump installation, waterproofing, drainrooter services and lead pipe
replacement are among their most common projects.

Owner and plumber, Vasyl Pygrodskyy has over 15 years of experience in the plumbing industry. His knowledgeable and friendly nature is why he has received tremendous feedback from past
customers. His clients have been more than willing to refer Water Guard Plumbing to their friends and family.

profile:
At Drain King Plumbers, every customers needs are important. Our promise is to focus on your satisfaction and provide you with the solution that best fits your needs.
 
Drain King Plumbers -


Some of our Services include: Plumbing Repairs and Drain Service, Water Service Replacement, Building Drain Replacement, Video (Camera) Inspection of Drains/Sewers, High Pressure Water Jetting/Power Flushing, Trenchless Technology, Water Purification, Backwater Valve and Sump Pump, Waterproofing & Storm Drainage
We service locations near you: 
Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke, Brampton, Mississauga, York Region, & Durham Region 

Drain King Plumbers gets the job done right, the first time. Always on-time, we work quickly and efficiently to make the experience as painless as possible. You can always count of us 24/7! You never have to clean up after a Drain King Technician, we will leave the work area as clean, or cleaner!

Call the go-to plumbing experts at Drain King Now! 416-661-KING(5464)

Same Price, Any Time, Any Day: No suprises or unexpected bills. Our flat rate pricing means no additional charges on evenings, weekends, and holidays.

At Drain King Plumbers, we believe that providing quality service at reasonable flat-rate prices give Toronto homeowners the confidence they need to make the right choice. 

Drain King Plumbers are experts at: 
* Basement Flood Prevention 
* Sewer Back-up/Flooded Basement
* Backwater Valve Installation 
* Sump Pump and Sewage Pumps
Drain & Sewer Specialists: 
* Drain Camera Inspection 
* Drain Snaking 
* Drain Cleaning 
* Hydro-flushing/scrubbing/Jetting (high pressure water drain cleaning clears blockages and restores your pipe to near new condition) 
* No Dig Trenchless Technology (remove those tree roots and replace broken clay pipes without the expense of digging up your yard) 


Need a plumber in Toronto or Greater Toronto Area? Call us at 416-661-KING(5464). Trust the plumbing and drain company people rely on. Call Drain King Plumbers! your satisfaction is always guaranteed!
PLUMBING & DRAIN SERVICES 
* Emergency Services: In a home plumbing emergency, you can count on Drain King Plumbers. With one simple phone call, you can significantly reduce stress and property damage that a sudden plumbing or drain issue can cause.
* Trenchless Pipe Repair: Call us before you decide to tear up your basement or landscaping! Our Trenchless methods could save you tens of thousands of dollars! We use quick, easy, reliable and permanent trenchless repair methods. 
* Damaged Sewer Lines: Cracked sewer pipes are a common source of costly property damage and potentially serious health issues for homeowners. Not to worry, Drain King Plumbers is right around the corner!
* Water Heater Replace/Repair: Hot water is essential in your showers, bathtubs, kitchen sinks, dishwashers and washing machines. 
* Water Softeners & Filters: With whole-house or under counter water softening/filtration equipment installed by Drain King, you know your water is safe.
* Sump Pump & Battery Backup Systems: A sump pump keeps your basement dry and mold free, but occasionally it can malfunction or become overwhelmed. Get a battery backup for peace of mind in the next heavy rainstorm. 
* Clogged Toilet Repair: Does your toilet clog or overflow? Be sure to fix the clog before it becomes a serious problem that can cause water damage and mold.
* Clogged Shower Repair: Is your shower slow draining? Have no fear! Drain King is here!
* Clogged Drain Repair: Clogged drains rarely get better on their own. Dont wait until is becomes a bigger issue! Call Now! 416-661-KING(5464)
* Frozen Pipe/Drain Repair: Is water gushing out of your ceiling or wall? It could be a burst pipe! Call us right away - to make the problem go away!
Drain King Plumbers - where every customer gets the Royal Treatment!
416-661-KING(5464)
www.drainkingplumbers.ca
info@drainkingplumbers.ca
